ygData.msgSnippet: Firedrill was shaken from the long state of thinking he was in. What? he said calmly, Oh, Ironhide, yeah he is old. I m sure he s still around, I saw him

Firedrill was shaken from the long state of thinking he was in. "What?"
he said calmly, "Oh, Ironhide, yeah he is old. I'm sure he's still
around, I saw him just a few months ago." Firedrill said thoughtfully.
He turned and looked over the horizen, "What's taking Cliffjumper and
Torca?" he asked, concern begining to be etched on his face.
